constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 88 (Thursday, May 20, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. GARBARINO:
H.R. 3392.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article 1, Section 8, Clause 18 of the U.S. Constitution.
[Page H2653]

latestAction.text: Referred to the House Committee on Small Business.

title: To amend the Economic Aid to Hard-Hit Small Businesses, Nonprofits, and Venues Act with respect to grants for shuttered venue operators, and for other purposes.
